author: Antony Worrall Thompson
method: Whizz together the cherry tomatoes, caster sugar and seasoning in a food processor.  Slowly add the olive oil until all the ingredients are combined. Check the seasoning, and serve.
ingredients: 300g/10Â½oz cherry tomatoes,  2 tsp caster sugar,  salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste,  25ml/1fl oz olive oil
